description.narrative:
Forum Syd har ansökt om finansiering av egeninsats om 12 739 731 SEK för EU-projektet "Comprehensive Rural Development for the promotion of sustainable Peace" för perioden 2019-2022.
Insatsen syftar att:
"Contribute to sustainable rural development and territorial peace for local Colombian peasant and indigenous organisations, rural communities and reincorporated population in six Territorial Training and Reincorporation Spaces (TTRS). The Project goal is that rural communities and reincorporated population in conflict-affected rural areas enhance their living conditions during the Peace Agreement implementation, focused on the components of the Comprehensive Rural Development".
Insatsens övergripande mål är:
Output 1: Men and women from local organizations, vulnerable population and reincorporated population (LOVPRP) effectively contribute to environmentally sustainable local rural development through the successful identification and implementation of productive projects in conflict-affected areas.
Output 2: LOVPRP effectively contribute to generating a sense of belonging and roots in rural areas and the sustainability of territorial peace.
Forum Syd kommer att arbeta i samverkan med fem svenska organisationer: Diakonia, We Effect, Act Svenska kyrkan, The Lutheran World Federation och SweFOR. Vidare kommer Forum Syd att samverka med tio lokala civilsamhällesorganisationer: COORDOSAC, CRIC, FUNDECIMA, Mujeres por un Nuevo Paraíso/Casa de la Memoria, CEALDES, ASCATRUI, Cooperativa Multiactiva J.E., ARG – Asociación agropecuaria de El Retorno, ACA, ECOMÚN. Forum Syd är huvudsökande organisation och bär det övergripande ansvaret för projektets implementering och koordinering.
Den aktuella insatsen har EU-kommissionens referensnummer T06.39. Insatsen har en total budget på 6 000 000 EUR, vilket motsvarar cirka 62 993 093 SEK. Av detta har Forum Syd beviljats 4 800 000 EUR från EU-kommissionen och ansöker om 12 739 731 SEK (cirka 25 procent) från Sida.

Forum Syd has applied for funding of 12 739 731 SEK to carry out the EU-project "Comprehensive Rural Development for the promotion of sustainable Peace" during the period 2019-2022.
The action aims to:
"Contribute to sustainable rural development and territorial peace for local Colombian peasant and indigenous organizations, rural communities and reincorporated population in six Territorial Training and Reincorporation Spaces (TTRS). The Project goal is that rural communities and reincorporated population in conflict-affected rural areas enhance their living conditions during the Peace Agreement implementation, focused on the components of Comprehensive Rural Development."
The overall goal is that:
Output 1: Men and women from local organizations, vulnerable population and reincorporated population (LOVPRP) effectively contribute to environmentally sustainable local rural development through the successful identification and implementation of productive projects in conflict-affected areas.
Output 2: LOVPRP effectively contribute to generating a sense of belonging and roots in rural areas and the sustainability of territorial peace.
Forum Syd will collaborate with five Swedish civil society organizations: Diakonia, We Effect, Act Swedish Church, The Lutheran World Federation and SweFOR. Furthermore, Forum Syd will collaborate with local civil society organizations: COORDOSAC, CRIC, FUNDECIMA, Mujeres por un Nuevo Paraíso/Casa de la Memoria, CEALDES, ASCATRUI, Cooperative Multiactiva J.E., ARG - Asociación agropecuaria de El Retorno, ACA, ECOM, ECOM. Forum Syd is lead applicant to Sida and has the overall responsibility for the implementation and coordination of the project.
The contribution has the EU Commission reference number: T06.39. The contribution's total budget is EUR 6 000 000 EUR, which corresponds to approximately 62 993 093 SEK. The requested support from Sida is 12 739 731 SEK, which corresponds to approximately 25 percent of the total budget.

Insatsens övergripande mål är att "contribute to sustainable rural development and territorial peace for local Colombian peasant and indigenous organisations, rural communities and reincorporated population in six Territorial Training and Reincorporation Spaces (TTRS)".
Insatsens specifika mål är "that rural communities and reincorporated population in conflict-affected rural areas enhance their living conditions during the Peace Agreement implementation, focused on the components of the Comprehensive Rural Development".

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution

tag.narrative: 1.b - Create sound policy frameworks at the national, regional and international levels, based on pro-poor and gender-sensitive development strategies, to support accelerated investment in poverty eradication actions.

1.b - Upprätta sunda policyramverk på nationell, regional och internationell nivå på grundval av utvecklingsstrategier som stödjer de fattiga och tar hänsyn till jämställdhetsaspekter, för att stödja ökade investeringar i åtgärder för att avskaffa fattigdom.
16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.

2.3 - By 2030, double the agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers, in particular women, indigenous peoples, family farmers, pastoralists and fishers, including through secure and equal access to land, other productive resources and inputs, knowledge, financial services, markets and opportunities for value addition and non-farm employment.

2.3 - Till 2030 fördubbla jordbrukets produktivitet och inkomster för småskaliga livsmedelsproducenter, i synnerhet kvinnor, ursprungsfolk, familjejordbrukare, boskapsskötande nomader samt fiskare, inklusive genom säker och lika tillgång till mark, andra produktionsresurser och insatsvaror, kunskap, finansiella tjänster och marknader samt möjligheter till värdeskapande och sysselsättning utanför jordbruket.
